product_name: Sea to Summit Insect Shield CoolMax Adaptor Liner - Mummy
long_description: This Sea to Summit Insect Shield CoolMax Adapter bag liner is specifically designed for use in warm, humid and buggy conditions providing odorless insect protection and moisture management.
